name: Hidden (Company of Three)
description:
This is a game about learning basics of programming.  User will learn how code-logic works through playing the game.  Also tells a story about rebellion against an tyrant.Being an ordinary person, he hides his messages in different robots in hope to be found by someone, someday.

Credits:

  • Aurko Roy - Programmer
  • Rajib Hassan - Artist
  • Fahim Ahmed - Programmer
